message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, $200 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product. What do you think?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $200 is my bottom line. I believe this product is worth every penny, and I'm confident you'll find value in it.
